definition: to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Each year, an estimated 500 billion to 1 trillion plastic bags are consumed worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 每年全球的胶袋使用量估计有5千亿到1万亿个。

sentences.english: What is the application rate of Bona Naturale?
sentences.chinese: 博纳自然漆的使用量是多少？

sentences.english: We must cut down on the amount of material we use.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须削减原料使用量。

sentences.english: Made sure to draw the category and the best usage quantities of the film.
sentences.chinese: 确定了涂膜剂的种类和最佳使用量。

sentences.english: The emissions will escalate as nitrogen trifluoride's use increases.
sentences.chinese: 随着使用量增加，三氟化氮的排放量也将升级。

sentences.english: The temptation, therefore, is to use less of it.
sentences.chinese: 因此减少其使用量是有诱惑力的。

sentences.english: Grafting can reduce the need to use pesticides on crops.
sentences.chinese: 嫁接可以减少植物对于农药的使用量。

sentences.english: That, however, in no way detracts from its enormous utility.
sentences.chinese: 但是这并不会减损对它们的巨大使用量。

sentences.english: A great quantity of welding consumables is used in Jiangsu since it is a large province with various industry.
sentences.chinese: 江苏作为经济大省，工业门类繁多，焊材使用量大。

sentences.english: We'll need to find ways to reduce the amount of wiring.
sentences.chinese: 因此我们需要找到一种解决减少线束使用量的办法。

sentences.english: In addition, the optimum content of FYT can be decided through the strength test.
sentences.chinese: 材料最佳使用量可通过强度试验测定。

sentences.english: Use a measuring cup or take cough medicine in pill form.
sentences.chinese: 使用量杯或者药丸形式的咳嗽药。

sentences.english: It is carried out by using some lumps and a set of especial guiding boring-hole device. This method is easy and convenient.
sentences.chinese: 提出了联合使用量块和一套导向镗孔装置的解决方案。

sentences.english: The less felting liquid can be used than other sand when using NFS .
sentences.chinese: 粘结剂使用量较其他粒形铸模砂少。

sentences.english: The goal of the Prius is to use less gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 普锐斯的目的是要减少汽油使用量。

sentences.english: Requires that you only pay for what you use.
sentences.chinese: 需要您仅根据使用量进行支付。

definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
